attributes.action: Insurance companies to give more reasonable quotes to newly qualified drivers
attributes.additional_details: It's damn near impossible to get a decent quote nowadays. Tried to get a quote for an early 2010s 1.3 litre Toyota that was known for being reliable and running well while doing good mileage. The lowest quote I received was for 9 thousand pounds which was almost 4 times as expensive as the car itself. This was inclusive of the fact that I had chose the cheapest cover and added both my parents as second drivers with over 25 years of driving experience each
attributes.background: We want the government to force insurance companies to give better and more reasonable quotes to younger and newly qualifying drivers, especially in places with worse reputation

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636551
Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies
